ta.title: ஒரு போலீஸ் அதிகாரி ஒரு மழையில் கொல்லப்பட்டார்

en.title: A police officer killed in a shower

summary_lines: A tragic incident occurred where a police officer was fatally shot while taking a shower at home. This unexpected event has shocked the community, highlighting the dangers law enforcement officers face even off-duty.
